text:
Threat Stack - Boston, MA - ONSITE

You can check out our jobs here: https://www.threatstack.com/jobs.html

We're looking for full-time engineers. We need:

Platform/Backend - nodeJS, Cassandra Javascript - React C++ dev UX Design Lead Director of Product

This picture pretty much sums up our work culture: https://twitter.com/samanthakoliver/status/68806415018295296...

Also, our motto is, "It's probably fine."

Compensation includes base salary, equity grant, health/dental coverage, 401k, and all the Red Bull you can drink.

You can apply online or message me at sam.oliver@threatstack.com.
